nodes.body:
### PR summary [1a7a1ea678](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/19181/commits/1a7a1ea6788fc93d7a1681d73e453372f86b9108)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Data.LazyList.Basic`|-377|
| `Mathlib.Deprecated.LazyList`|377|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`++ injective_pointReflection_left_of_injective_two_nsmul`
`++ pointReflection_fixed_iff_of_injective_two_nsmul`
`++-- injective_pointReflection_left_of_injective_bit0`
`++-- pointReflection_fixed_iff_of_injective_bit0`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>Decrease in tech debt: (relative, absolute) = (0.12, 0.01)</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|5094|-2|porting notes|
|183|-2|adaptation notes|
|188|-18|disabled deprecation lints|
|17|1|`Deprecated` files|
|2830|112|total LoC in `Deprecated` files|

Current commit [1a7a1ea678](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/1a7a1ea6788fc93d7a1681d73e453372f86b9108)
Reference commit [38affacc35](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/38affacc35abeefc7fd0c782d547d6b745281ad7)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/9f05b2a8-ef93-45f4-96d8-0ede8951358b) for commit 2333880f40591b546c53917eeab9c0a41760924e.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/65068818-85a3-4007-bec7-12c9d7c81ec5/to/9f05b2a8-ef93-45f4-96d8-0ede8951358b) against commit 38affacc35abeefc7fd0c782d547d6b745281ad7.

|File|Instructions|%|
|-|-:|:-:|
|`build`|+6.401⬝10⁹|(+0.00%)|
|`Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.ExteriorAlgebra.Grading`|+4.412⬝10⁹|(+8.49%)|
|`Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.CliffordAlgebra.Grading`|+2.1⬝10⁹|(+2.47%)|
For ExteriorAlgebra, we're looking at either 20k heartbeats using the deprecated lemma, or 32k without. This is far under the limit, and minor, so I don't think we need to worry.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11985344769/job/33417126579)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11985344769/job/33417126693)

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

Thanks :tada:

bors merge
Should this be renamed? Also, the proof now can be just `Iff.rfl`, so this can be `odd_def`
Follow-up PR please.

I am pretty sure `AlgHom.map_add` was used for performance reasons...

Can you please run !bench once CI passes?
Looks like I correctly remembered
The difference here is 5000 heartbeats, again inconsequential.
Then you should remove the comment above

This theorem is a duplicate of [`Cardinal.aleph_eq_preAleph`](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/SetTheory/Cardinal/Aleph.html#Cardinal.aleph_eq_preAleph) and it should have been deprecated. (I seem to have forgotten to do so)
@vihdzp, would you mind just pushing this change to this PR?
Done!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: cleanup of many set_option deprecated.linter false
